# The Bottom of the Barrel

The prompt given was to create puzzles in genres that had never shown up in any previous Logic Showcases.

Click the images to solve on Penpa+/puzz.link.

[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/crossroads.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)

[![Click to solve on puzz.link](../../images/puzzles/2024/firewalk.png)](https://pzprxs.vercel.app/p?firewalk/10/10/00e080e0ea6a0e020200p4i6m4m4v4h4j4x6j6m6r)
